title: [K-12] Metaverse-Based Human-Machine Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Metaverse-based learning program for non-degree-seeking adult learners in social sciences, operated in mobile environments. Focuses on project-based learning combining peer collaboration and AI tool utilization

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with AI assistants in metaverse environments to design social problem-solving projects.
Learners perform at least three real-time collaborative scenarios with peer learners using digital avatars.
Learners create at least one piece of creative content (e.g., 3D models, virtual posters) using metaverse tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
